name: Flip-flop (itch) (robertli_games)
description:
-------------------------------README-----------------------------------

Key Mapping: ←→: move / space: jump / Z: switch world (Left/Right) / X: switch world (Inner/Outer) / ENTER: NEXT LEVEL

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Story: When the fish were poked by bamboo sticks, they mastered the control of their souls in the dual world at the end of their lives. Let us wish them a smooth "escape" from this garbage-filled world...
